Name: Oppai Muse
About the game: ♥ PLAY WITH ONE HAND ♥ Watch animated muses with pretty bodies. Collect stars and hearts to gain points. Listen to 7 original songs initially. Stay tuned for more. ♥ RELAX ON THE INTERACTIVE GALLERY ♥ Select the muse’s clothes, or hide them. Select background and facial expressions as you desire. Adjust the position and zoom of your camera anywhere you want. ♥ WORSHIP YOUR OPPAI MUSE ♥ Add text and visual effects for a personal touch. Get creative and share your memes with friends. Or simply worship your favorite animated muse by yourself... ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
